name: WhiteVault's night of terror!
description:
A game made for WhiteVault.

Uh oh! You did something very not poggers and angered an ancient eldritch entity. Now you must use your wits, your luck and some very conveniently placed keys to escape the malicious mansion once and for all!

CONTROLS

___________

WASD to move

LEFT CLICK to toggle your flashlight

HOLD E to interact with outlined objects

ESC to pause because you need a change of pants ;)

BUILD UPDATES

_________________

1.0.2 - Nerfed the scouts, so that they despawn when hiding in a box. Shortened all interact times
